title: Who Is Drew Starkey Dating? Girlfriend & Relationship History
description: Is Drew Starkey dating Odessa A’zion? Follow the buzz around their rumored romance. The post Who Is Drew Starkey Dating? Girlfriend & Relationship History appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Shazmeen Navrange
excerpt: Fans are excited to know more about Drew Starkey's dating status and his rumored romance with Odessa A'Zion, so here are the details.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Fans have been captivated by Drew Starkey’s charm and appearances in popular shows, curious to know if he’s dating anyone. Recently, Starkey rose to fame, securing critically-acclaimed projects like Ozark and Queer. While his on-screen roles are often discussed, his personal life has drawn just as much attention. So, who is Drew Starkey’s girlfriend? Who is Drew Starkey’s girlfriend? Starkey is rumored to be dating Odessa A’zion. Like Starkey, A’zion is also a renowned actress, known for her roles in CBS’s Fam and Netflix’s Grand Army. The rumored couple worked together in the 2022 adaptation of Clive Barker’s Hellraiser, portraying characters Riley and Trevor, who were love interests in the David Bruckner-directed film. Since then, their on-screen chemistry and frequent social media interactions have sparked rumors about their real-life romance. Fans fueled the speculation further when Odessa A’zion shared a playful Instagram post for Starkey’s birthday. She posted a series of photos with a humorous caption: “Happy birthday Joseph. Keep eating that pb n j once a day, it’s really good for ur bones. P.s. don’t play hat wars unless you want to not be alive.” Despite these hints, both Starkey and A’zion have remained tight-lipped about their off-screen relationship. Drew Starkey’s relationship history Over the years, Starkey has been linked to a few popular figures, including Claire Van der Linden, and has kept a relatively low profile regarding his romantic life. However, he has been fairly private about his love life, with limited information available about his past relationships. According to The Sun, he reportedly dated Linden, known for her roles in Knives and Skin (2019) and Empire. The two appeared together in the short film The Radical Notion of Gene Mutation (2014), which is likely where they met and sparked their rumored romance. However, their relationship was never officially confirmed, and neither Starkey nor Linden has publicly addressed the rumors.
html:
Fans have been captivated by Drew Starkey’s charm and appearances in popular shows, curious to know if he’s dating anyone. Recently, Starkey rose to fame, securing critically-acclaimed projects like Ozark and Queer. While his on-screen roles are often discussed, his personal life has drawn just as much attention. So, who is Drew Starkey’s girlfriend?

Who is Drew Starkey’s girlfriend?

Starkey is rumored to be dating Odessa A’zion.

Like Starkey, A’zion is also a renowned actress, known for her roles in CBS’s Fam and Netflix’s Grand Army. The rumored couple worked together in the 2022 adaptation of Clive Barker’s Hellraiser, portraying characters Riley and Trevor, who were love interests in the David Bruckner-directed film. Since then, their on-screen chemistry and frequent social media interactions have sparked rumors about their real-life romance.

Fans fueled the speculation further when Odessa A’zion shared a playful Instagram post for Starkey’s birthday. She posted a series of photos with a humorous caption: “Happy birthday Joseph. Keep eating that pb n j once a day, it’s really good for ur bones. P.s. don’t play hat wars unless you want to not be alive.” Despite these hints, both Starkey and A’zion have remained tight-lipped about their off-screen relationship.

Drew Starkey’s relationship history

Over the years, Starkey has been linked to a few popular figures, including Claire Van der Linden, and has kept a relatively low profile regarding his romantic life.

However, he has been fairly private about his love life, with limited information available about his past relationships. According to The Sun, he reportedly dated Linden, known for her roles in Knives and Skin (2019) and Empire.

The two appeared together in the short film The Radical Notion of Gene Mutation (2014), which is likely where they met and sparked their rumored romance. However, their relationship was never officially confirmed, and neither Starkey nor Linden has publicly addressed the rumors.
